segments.text: Good afternoon , Peace restaurant , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to reserve a table for two , my wife and I .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . What time would you like , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . Perhaps around 8 PM .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , a reserve a table for two at 8 PM , sir , may I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mr.Berman . and you prefer smoking or non-smoking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Non-smoking will be fine , please . But it is more important that you get a table by the window . It's our anniversary , and I'd like to be very special .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll try my best . With a toward to having with this tonight , Mr.Berman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye , and have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S1
